eqwrsnbd.jcr:title: Flying Snowboard
eqwrsnbd.features: Since its humble beginnings, innovation has defined the Flying Snowboard series and set it apart as the most popular, versatile, and mimicked board in snowboarding. These days, the one-board answer to all terrain celebrates its 20-year reign with a proven formula that combines time-honored design and envelope-pushing ingredients for a lightweight, poppy, and stable snowboard that were unheard of two decades ago.
eqwrsnbd.reviews:
By NE2WA from Edmonds, WA
This watch/gps/heart rate monitor is a data crunching gem. With the free online connection, you can actually watch a graphical display of your swim/run on a map with associated changes in your heart rate, pace and step rate (with the foot chip). It takes a little time to set up, but is simple to use once you get started. I am loving this device and the feedback it's giving me.
eqwrsnbd.summary: Often imitated, never outdone, and backed by a 20-year legacy as snowboardingâ€™s one-board answer to all terrain.
